desc: We practice organic, biodynamic farming, healthy living, and respectful relations with our wildlife and forests. Our sheep are 100% grass fed. We do not feed corn or soy to any of our animals. We offer private tours, educational programs, Equine guided coaching, upick, and limited edition garden and wild crafted goods.

layout.text: Embracing nature and spirit for healthy living
Healing venues, farm life, healthy living and good old fashion kitchen wisdom
